posts.post_title: FS (All Sold)- A few T205 Hofers SGC graded
posts.post_content:
For Sale a few tougher to find HOF T205's all SGC graded.  Please message if interested, price includes shipping.  NC residents add 6.5% ST.

T205 Frank "Home Run" Baker Piedmont - SGC 2  $OLD

T205 Chief Bender Piedmont - SGC 3 - $old

T205 Eddie Collins Mouth Open Honest Long Cut - SGC 1 (more difficult to find) - $OLD

T205 Eddie Collins Mouth Closed Hassan - SGC 2 - $old
